com.stripe.stripeterminal

Interface InstallUpdateCallback


  • public interface InstallUpdateCallback
    InstallUpdateCallback is a callback returned by Terminal.checkForUpdate(com.stripe.stripeterminal.ReaderSoftwareUpdateCallback) to give the user the option to install the updates. https://stripe.com/docs/terminal/readers/bbpos-chipper2xbt#software-updates-and-releases

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void call(boolean installUpdate)
      This method should be called with a boolean value indicating whether the SDK should begin installing an available reader software update.

    • Method Detail

      • call

        void call(boolean installUpdate)
   throws TerminalException
        This method should be called with a boolean value indicating whether the SDK should begin installing an available reader software update. If an update is initiated, the reader will become unresponsive until the update is complete. In some cases, you will need to restart the reader at the end of the update.
        Parameters:
        installUpdate - A boolean value indicating whether the SDK should proceed with the update.
        Throws:
        TerminalException
